significantly improves.from sentence: Adding the branch of five facial landmark regression significantly improves the face box AP ( 0.408 % ) and mAP ( 0.775 % ) on the Hard subset , suggesting that landmark localisation is crucial for improving the accuracy of face detection .

dense regression branch.from sentence: By contrast , adding the dense regression branch increases the face box AP on Easy and Medium subsets but slightly deteriorates the results on the Hard subset , indicating the difficulty of dense regression under challenging scenarios .

landmark and dense regression.from sentence: Nevertheless , learning landmark and dense regression jointly enables a further improvement compared to adding landmark regression only .
